Re Dow Pipeline Cc Please see attached email reguarding Entex and advise which deal is good Thanks From Karen Lindley PM To Michael nron cc Subject Dow Pipeline Can you please verify the following and let me know if I need to do an accounting arrangement to correct Thanks Karen Forwarded by Karen LindleyCorpEnron on PM From Sherlyn Schumack ECT PM To Karen NRON cc Paul nron Subject Dow Pipeline It should be on deal Forwarded by Sherlyn SchumackHOUECT on PM From Sherlyn Schumack PM To Karen NRON cc Subject Dow Pipeline Karen The Entex volumes on Dow pipeline at meter is scheduled on an expired deal for

On Call NotesMark from Aquilla was short into the Valero Hub and it appeared that PGE may have to cut Aquillas delivery into us but Mark was able to get the he needed to make the delivery Transco Bammel had some Unit testing by Transco preventing flow until PM I got with Robert A From the East desk and he decided to go ahead and cut the nom down to for Saturdays gas day I changed the confirm in Pops to reflect it Changed confirm for Midcon Hardy to show the correct Changed the confirm for Flaggstaff to show the correct Communicated with Reggie from Dynegy to get at Transco Markham for Saturdays gas day confirmed with Transco It was finally confirmed later that night Sunday At the flow into Valero Riverside was d out and changed to Valero TVille for the remainder of the gas day Gas Control said to do it verbally I could not get a hold of any scheduler with PGE to see the contractual impact I let Ed Gottlob know and he said to just let it flow
deal is the deal we made for El Paso last Friday to replace deal which had Teco Julie Meyers needs a price to be added to the deal Which price should I add

Re meter may need more assistance on this issue I tried to extend the deal and it blocked me saying Teco Gas Processing Company is suspended Deal with inactive or suspended counterparty may not be extended Any suggestions Daren J CT PM To Michael NRON cc Subject Re meter You can extend them but make sure that the volume is zero D Michael NRON PM To Daren J CT cc Subject meter Volume management was wondering if deals and needed to be extended into These are deals with Teco Let me know if you need me to extend them
meter management was wondering if deals and needed to be extended into These are deals with Teco Let me know if you need me to extend them

meter The above meter recorded a flow on Jan this year It has not had any activity all the way back through I checked with Cheryl Jones and the flow is good It was apparently turned on for that one day Do we need to put in a deal for this flow Thanks Also we had a transport nom from Texaco into King Ranch so we will have adequate flow into Stratton

Deal Do you know if this deal was supposed to run through and It was a deal to buy per day from Harman Operating and is currently in for to Volume management said they are looking for their money Let me know Thanks

Meter Do you know if there should be a deal in place for Midcoast on this meter for January Currently it only shows ENA I understand that a deal was added in December for Midcoast but that deal was only good for Dec Thanks Mike
meter Dec and Jan production there are flow volumes without a deal Deal was good for November Do you want to extend this deal or should there be another counterparty added Thanks
Deal The above deal number expired at the end of November and needs to either be extended through December or a new deal inputted Can you assist me in this Thanks Mike

I was wondering if it would be OK for me to sit in with you one day to get a general feel of your end of the process Pat had told me before he left that it would help me better grasp the process as a whole I understand the imminent cold weather is making things crazy so now may not be the best time to be in your way But let me know if I can spend a day morning or even just an afternoon down there with you whenever it is a good time I think it will help me very much in my role Thanks Mike

Two quick questions Volume Management seems to think that we had business on Blue Dolphin Pipeline for August I told them that we had none and that whatever they have is AEP business They insisted that it was ours and sent down Allocation Statements from Blue Dolphin WE have nothing in the system so I have no idea what to say to them beyond what I think is the case that AEP has this business now As for the Industrial research I got your message and I assume I should focus on the ones on the map The map has plants listed with pipeline connects I will call them for capacities and flexibility All errors were taken care of by Jay and I with little trouble Thanks Mike

Daren I have no problem sticking around with the group it is a compliment and I am glad that you all appreciate what I have been able to contribute to the group I just want your opinion on something One of my many goals while a part of the analyst program is to become a senior analyst or third year analyst It is a promotion that also brings with it a bit of a pay increase In no way do I want to imply greed or that I will only stay for money but if in your opinion I may be deserving of this then maybe we could run it by Bob or the program or whoever is in control of that Just a thought let me know what you think Mike

RESounds good Thanks Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Friday November PM To Olsen Michael Subject RE Mike I very much appreciate what you have done for our desk Let me look into the promotions within and out of the analyst program I want to take the best option possible D Original Message From Olsen Michael Sent Wednesday November PM To Farmer Daren J Subject Daren I have no problem sticking around with the group it is a compliment and I am glad that you all appreciate what I have been able to contribute to the group I just want your opinion on something One of my many goals while a part of the analyst program is to become a senior analyst or third year analyst It is a promotion that also brings with it a bit of a pay increase In no way do I want to imply greed or that I will only stay for money but if in your opinion I may be deserving of this then maybe we could run it by Bob or the program or whoever is in control of that Just a thought let me know what you think Mike

RE Centana Storage Deal Cc Rita Stephen and I have been working on this matter We are getting the contracts and counter parties activated so they can be pathed for September I talked to Stephen this morning and he is working with global to get the counter parties active Thanks Mike Original Message From Wynne Rita Sent Tuesday December AM To Olsen Michael Swisher Stephen Cc Anastas Sherry Farmer Daren J Subject Centana Storage Deal MikeStephen Have the two of you been able to get the deal in for the sale of the Centana storage to AEP Please advise I would like to have this completed for this close if possible Daren if you are not aware of this transaction please let me know Thanks

FW Release of Deal pst Original Message From Schumack Sherlyn Sent Monday July AM To Olsen Michael Cc Majorwitz Buddy Subject FW Release of Deal Mike I looked in Sitara and deal is still not released I talked to you about this on Friday Can you get someone to release this deal please Thu said that they are not able to release the deal at AEP Original Message From Majorwitz Buddy Sent Monday July AM To Schumack Sherlyn Subject Release of Deal Sherlyn Can you follow up on that deal we were looking at on Friday You had called and asked someone to release the deal so that it would show up in Path Manager or something to that effect Ive looked in Sitara this morning and it doesnt look like it has been released or validated yet Thanks for your help Let me know if you need anything from me Buddy

FW Centana Storagepst Original Message From Swisher Stephen Sent Tuesday November AM To Olsen Michael Subject FW Centana Storage Importance High Mike I need a deal entered into Sitra and pathed for the sale of the Centana Storage to AEP See below Any questions give me a call Thanks Stephen R Swisher Specialist Energy Operations Enron Net Works LLC Phone Fax Cell Email Original Message From Wynne Rita Sent Tuesday November PM To Pond Jim Cc Koerselman Lisa Lo Connie Swisher Stephen Subject RE Centana Storage Stephen Please get with Logistics to get a deal entered and pathed for this transaction If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Original Message From Pond Jim Sent Tuesday November PM To Wynne Rita Cc Koerselman Lisa Lo Connie Swisher Stephen Subject RE Centana Storage The GL currently has MMBTU I believe the sale took place in the facility Original Message From Wynne Rita Sent Tuesday November PM To Pond Jim Cc Koerselman Lisa Lo Connie Swisher Stephen Subject RE Centana Storage Jim Where did the sale take place Was it an in place sale at the facility Stephen is working on the reconciliation If he cannot have it completed by this close then we will have unaccounted for until he finishes his reconciliation We will do everything possible to get it cleared this close What does the GL currently have for the storage number Original Message From Pond Jim Sent Tuesday November PM To Wynne Rita Cc Koerselman Lisa Lo Connie Subject Centana Storage Rita It looks like we will be making our Bammel trueup payment to AEP in the next couple of days Included in the payment to AEP is a deduction for the sale of the Centana storage gas We are selling them MMBTU for a total of The sale is for September production We will need a deal put in Sitara for that sale along with the appropriate pathing from storage by logistics However there is only MMBTU on report in Unify for contracts and How do we account for this volumetic difference Connie will be truing up the GL to match the current Unify volume The GL was short approx MMBTU because a beginning balance was not booked This needs to happen before the upcoming close Thanks for you help in this matter Please let me know of any concerns

deal Astrapst Daren Not to be picky but this deal is in for and I confirmed do you mind if I up it one giant decatherm I need to so I can path in balance and prevent errors on our reports Thanks

deal pst Meter recorded flow from March th to the end of the month averaging around per day The above deal has a zero volume in it creating an allocation exception at that point Bob is out and this is a gathering point so do you have any objection with me inserting a deal volume of per day for that time period Thanks

FW State and County Verificationpst I cant figure out what to make of this Original Message From Sheeren Ryan Sent Tuesday October AM To Olsen Michael Smith George F Subject State and County Verification This is a follow up to the email I sent earlier in th month Please be advised that we have discrepancies with the State and County information for the meter No s listed on the attached spreadsheet Will you please review this spreadsheet and provide the State and County information that you may have for the listed meters If you are not the scheduler for this pipe please forward this to the appropriate scheduler Please do not hesitate to contact me Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Global Facilities

RE TXU May Cc This deal was not transported on contract the was sold to El Paso Merchant directly at that point It was a day for the th and st Let me know if you need anything further Mike Original Message From Beale Antoinette Sent Wednesday October PM To Olsen Michael Cc Parker Megan Farmer Daren J Subject TXU May Mike I have the following outstanding issue with TXU May Contract A path is needed on Delivery for mmbtus with the Receipt point Thanks

RE Black Marlin Cc It has been taken care of Let me know if you need anythign further Original Message From Schumack Sherlyn Sent Friday September PM To Olsen Michael Cc Farmer Daren J Subject FW Black Marlin Have you had a chance to look at this yet Original Message From Schumack Sherlyn Sent Friday September PM To Olsen Michael Cc Farmer Daren J Subject Black Marlin Mike I show you pathed deal on for production months January and February This deal expired and the late pathing has caused a bridgeback error for January and February OLE Object Picture Metafile

FW EPGT pst Here is the email you needed Original Message From Ogunbunmi Hakeem Sent Monday September PM To Olsen Michael Cc Wynne Rita Schumack Sherlyn Kinsey Lisa Subject FW EPGT Mike This is the email that we sent to you on the th of August Please let me know if I can be of further help Hakeem Ogunbunmi Volume Management Enron Net Works Original Message From Swisher Stephen Sent Monday August PM To Ogunbunmi Hakeem Olsen Michael Cc Schumack Sherlyn Subject RE EPGT Mike I have the same issue as Hakeem for January February and March Jan HPLOPL KATY meter number Withdrawl OPLC meter number Injection Feb HPLOPL KATY meter number Withdrawl OPLC meter number Injection March HPLOPL KATY meter number Withdrawl OPLC meter number Injection If you have any questions please let me know Thanks for your help Stephen R Swisher Specialist Energy Operations Enron Net Works LLC Phone Fax Email Original Message From Ogunbunmi Hakeem Sent Monday August PM To Olsen Michael Cc Schumack Sherlyn Swisher Stephen Subject EPGT Mike I have an interpipeline pool balance for Feb and Mar of I need a transport usage ticket to clear these balances Feb EPGT meter number is Injection Oasis meter number is Withdrawal March EPGT meter number EPGT meter number Oasis meter number Hakeem Ogunbunmi Volume Management Enron Net Works

Re HPL Texoma Meter Cc Jpst Daren Please see deal for this matter I nominated this transport for to Should there be a deal there Mary Poorman PM To Daren J FarmerHOUECT cc Michael nron Clay nronXgate Sabrae CT Edward CT Subject HPL Texoma Meter Daren The intercompanyinterdesk reflects an error for the above referenced day A transport usage ticket was put into the system for Dth Duke Carthage to Texoma however we do not have any supply on EPGT from Duke for this deal The package was confirmed according to POPS so we are probably missing the supply deal Please check on the dayprice it is the on k ta on EPGT I am trying to take care of some of these current month issues on the clean reports Mike Would you please make sure that this contract was nominated on EPGT for Thank you both for your assistance everyone else is FYI Mary

RE Super Bowl Party PST I appreciate the invite but I have already made plans to watch the game with some friends and family at my brothers place in Sugar Land What a dissapointment anyway Pitt blew it Original Message From Bass Eric Sent Monday January AM To Baumbach David Jeganathan Lenine Olsen Michael Lenhart Matthew Blanchard Timothy Winfree ONeal D Ryder Patrick Love Phillip M Kevin Boone Email Val Generes Email Cc Husser Shanna Subject Super Bowl Party I was thinking of having a get together at my place but I wanted to gauge interest first Let me know if you are interested I will send out another email if I get enough responses Eric

REPST I am in if AM wins and I accrue some income Original Message From Bass Eric Sent Friday November PM To Love Phillip M Blanchard Timothy Ryder Patrick Farmer Daren J Smith Jay Olsen Michael Parks Joe Baumbach David Hull Bryan Lenhart Matthew Winfree ONeal D Rabon Chance Mills Bruce Subject Im trying to get a feel for everyones desire to play PAINTBALL in the next few weeks This would obviously not be sponsored by Enron bc Enron doesnt have enough cash to buy anything right now So let me know if you would be interested and if so when you would be available to go The cost should be around a person Please forward to anyone I have forgotten or might be interested Eric

Tenaska IV Cc Charlie Joe Parks told me that you would be handling the Clebure deal for the estate team Attached are the forms you will need and some other basic information about the deal Let me know when you would like to go over it all Mike
pst Joe This is what I have worked up so far let me know if you have any other issues I can address in the summary Mike

pst Here are the details from my conversation with Lonestar They will not burn off large imbalances in the winter due to pressure constraints As for selling off some off the imbalance base load they have no problem with base loading or as long as we are capable of purchasing gas from spot suppliers if a cold front comes through and the plant begins to burn full capacity They will ask us to get on rate if that happens if Tenaska burns the full then we need to be putting that into the pipe it cannot come from our length Looks like they want us to stay on rate with the plant From looking at the plants burns to this point I think it would be safe to base load and try to sell more each day to stay flat with the plant For the rest of January you can try and sell some of that gas on the spot market The purchaser would need to buy it directly at the supply point and transport it away themselves Let me know what you all need from me I am about to get supply points for February MIke

pst My contact at TXU was unavailable I left him a message and hope to hear from him before I need to leave In case you need to talk to him here is his info Jeff Smiron Here is also the spreadsheet Let me know if you need anything additional
